channel.title: Projects on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Blog

item.description:
Snake Game in Kotlin-JS

An implementation of the classic snake game in Kotlin, compiled to Javascript

The assets in this directory are the result of a successful build of my kotlin-js-snake repo. Should these assets require updating, follow these steps:

  • Clone that repo
  • ./gradlew build
  • Copy kotlin.js, kotlin-html-js.js, and module.js from build/js into the js directory here
  • Copy the index.html file here, if changed

<html> <head> <title>üêç Snake</title> <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/normalize/5.0.0/normalize.css"> <link rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="57x57" href="{{ "/favicons/apple-icon-57x57.png" | absURL }}"> <link rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="60x60" href="{{ "/favicons/apple-icon-60x60.png" | absURL }}"> <link rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="72x72" href="{{ "/favicons/apple-icon-72x72.png" | absURL }}"> <link rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="76x76" href="{{ "/favicons/apple-icon-76x76.png" | absURL }}"> <link rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="114x114" href="{{ "/favicons/apple-icon-114x114.png" | absURL }}"> <link rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="120x120" href="{{ "/favicons/apple-icon-120x120.png" | absURL }}"> <link rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="144x144" href="{{ "/favicons/apple-icon-144x144.png" | absURL }}"> <link rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="152x152" href="{{ "/favicons/apple-icon-152x152.png" | absURL }}"> <link rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="180x180" href="{{ "/favicons/apple-icon-180x180.png" | absURL }}"> <link rel="icon" type="image/png" sizes="192x192" href="{{ "/favicons/android-icon-192x192.png" | absURL }}"> <link rel="icon" type="image/png" sizes="32x32" href="{{ "/favicons/favicon-32x32.png" | absURL }}"> <link rel="icon" type="image/png" sizes="96x96" href="{{ "/favicons/favicon-96x96.png" | absURL }}"> <link rel="icon" type="image/png" sizes="16x16" href="{{ "/favicons/favicon-16x16.png" | absURL }}"> <link rel="manifest" href="{{ "/favicons/manifest.json" | absURL }}"> </head> <body class="container">
<script src="javascript/kotlin.js"></script> <script src="javascript/kotlinx-html-js.js"></script> <script src="javascript/module.js"></script> </body> </html>
